message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. If you buy it, you'll be getting an incredible deal, as it's worth at least 50% more than the asking price. I'm confident you won't find a better deal on a product of this quality anywhere else. What do you say, are you ready to make a smart investment?
